DOC.brief_summary: Compare the effect of the HEALT[e]TEEN program and a HEALTH[e]TEEN plus coping skills training delivered to high school students on BMI, nutrition and physical activity behaviors, and self-efficacy over 6 months.
DOC.brief_title: Reducing Obesity and Type 2 Diabetes in High Risk Youth
DOC.criteria: Student enrolled in Health, Biology, or Public Health course Cognitive ability unable to read or respond to questions in program
